name: ts-morph-playground
description: ts-morph example gallery and playground application 100% in the browser

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run pack && npx tsc && sh build-workers.sh && npx parcel build src/index.html -d docs --no-content-hash --detailed-report --public-url './' && npm run copy && rm -rf ../../demos/docs/mirada-ts-playground && mkdir -p ../../demos/docs/mirada-ts-playground && cp -r docs/* ../../demos/docs/mirada-ts-playground
scripts.build-local: npm run build && gzip docs/*.* && npx http-server docs --gzip
scripts.copy: cp -r src/index.appcache node_modules/mirada/dist/src/opencv.js ../mirada/test/assets/* docs && cp -r node_modules/mirada/dist/src/opencv.js ../mirada/test/assets/*  dist
scripts.start: mkdir -p dist docs && npm run pack && npm run copy &&  cp docs/*.worker.js dist && npx parcel start --no-hmr --open --no-source-maps --no-autoinstall src/index.html
scripts.prettier: npx prettier  --write --arrow-parens avoid --parser typescript --use-tabs false --no-semi true --single-quote true --tab-width 2 --trailing-comma none --end-of-line lf --prose-wrap preserve --print-width 120 --jsx-bracket-same-line true "src/**/*.ts*"
scripts.pack: npm run pack-examples && npm run pack-files
scripts.pack-files: npx embed-json-in-ts --mode fs2json --input "node_modules/mirada/dist/src/**/*.d.ts" --output src/examples/mirada.json &&  rm -rf src/examples/mirada.json
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run pack && npm run prettier && npm run build

author: Sebastian Gurin
